summary: Tested blog navigation for ResizeObserver errors. Created test blog post and performed multiple navigation tests (normal and rapid). No ResizeObserver errors were detected. The existing fix in BlogPost.jsx using double requestAnimationFrame and contentReady state appears to be working correctly.
action_items: ResizeObserver error could not be reproduced in current testing environment
The fix in BlogPost.jsx (double RAF + contentReady state) appears to be working
If error persists in production, consider adding global ResizeObserver error suppression in index.js
critical_code_review_comments: BlogPost.jsx has proper fix implementation using double requestAnimationFrame and contentReady state
The handleBackClick properly resets contentReady before navigation
mountedRef is used correctly to prevent state updates on unmounted components
seed_data_creation: Created test blog post 'test-blog-post-resize-observer' with category 'fitness' for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Blog navigation tested with test post. No ResizeObserver errors found. If error reappears, check: 1) react-markdown v10.1.0 compatibility, 2) Header component backdrop-filter, 3) Any new components added to blog pages
